column3: How are you recently? (''more popular in daily usage'')
What is your name (''formal, literally means "How do I address you"'')?
Thank you. (''when someone gives you a gift'')
Is there someone here who speaks English?
column4: 呢度有冇人識講英文呀?
column5: nī douh yáuh móuh yàhn sīk góng Yīngmán a?
Chi só hái bīn douh a?
Ngóh dit jó go ngàhn bāau.

column4: 可唔可以借個電話用呀?
column5: Hó-m̀h-hó'yi je go dihnwáh yuhng a?
Ngóh haih-m̀h-haih béi yàhn lāai jó a?

column4: 我係 美國/澳州/英國/加拿大 公民.

column3: I want to talk to the American/Australian/British/Canadian embassy/consulate.
column4: 我要搵 美國/澳州/英國/加拿大 大使館/領事館.

column3: I want to talk to a lawyer.
Can I just pay a fine now?

column5: léuhng dím yāt/léuhng dím daahp yāt
léuhng dím yih/léuhng dím daahp yih
léuhng dím sāam/léuhng dím daahp sāam
léuhng dím gáu/léuhng dím daahp gáu
léuhng dím sahp/léuhng dím daahp sahp
Heui Yāt jēung fēi yiu géidō chín gah?

column4: 呢 [班火車]/[架巴士] 去邊度嘎?
去_____ [班火車]/[架巴士] 喺邊度搭嘎?
column5: Heui _____ [bāan fóchē]/[ga bāsí] hái bīndouh daap gah?

column4: 呢[班火車]/[架巴士]停唔停_____嘎?
column5: Nī [bāan fóchē]/[ga bāsí] tìhng-m̀h- tìhng _____ gah?

column3: When does the train/bus for _____ leave?
column4: 去_____[班火車/架巴士]幾點走嘎?
column5: Heui _____ [bāan fóchē]/[ga bāsí] géidím jáu gah?

column3: When will this train/bus arrive in _____?
column4: [班火車]/[架巴士]會幾點去到_____嘎?
column5: [Bāan fóchē]/[Ga bāsí] wúih géidím heuidou _____ gah?

column3: How much does it cost to get to _____?

column4: 美國/加拿大/澳州/英國 領事館?

column3: Where are there a lot of_____ ?
Can you show me on the map?
column4: 可唔可以喺張地圖度指俾我睇呀?
column5: Hó-m̀h-hó'yi hái jēung deihtòuh douh jí béi ngóh tái a?

column3: Do you have any rooms available?
How much is a room for one person/two people?
column4: 單人房/雙人房 要幾多錢呀?

column3: May I see the room first?
column4: 可唔可以睇下間房先呀?
column5: Hó-m̀h-hó'yi tái-háh gāan fóng sīn a?

column4: 你可唔可以介紹第二間酒店俾我呀?
column5: Néih hó-m̀h-hó'yi gaaisiuh daihyih gāan jáudim béi ngóh a?

column4: 包唔包 早餐/晚餐 嘎?
幾點有 早餐/晚餐 嘎?

column5: M̀h'gōi bōng ngóh jāp-háh gāan fóng.

column4: 你哋收唔收 美/澳/加 元嘎?

column3: Can you change money for me?
column5: Hó-m̀h-hó'yi bōng ngóh cheung chín a?

column3: Where can I get money changed?
column5: Ngóh hó'yi heui bīndouh cheung chín a?

column3: Can you change a traveler's check for me?
column4: 可唔可以幫我唱張旅行支票呀?
column5: Hó-m̀h-hó'yi bōng ngóh cheung jēung léuih'hàhng jīpiu a?

column3: Where can I get a traveler's check changed?
column4: 我可以去邊度唱張旅行支票呀?
column5: Ngóh hó'yi heui bīndouh cheung jēung léuih'hàhng jīpiu a?

column3: Where is an automatic teller machine (ATM)?
A table for one person/two people, please.
column4: 一張 一人枱/二人枱, 唔該.

column3: Can I look at the menu, please?
column4: 俾張餐牌我睇, 唔該.
column5: Béi jēung chāanpáai ngóh tái, m̀h'gōi.

column3: Can I look in the kitchen?
column4: 可唔可以睇吓個廚房呀?

column3: May I have a glass/cup of _____?
May I have a bottle of _____?
Excuse me, waiter? (''getting attention of server'')

column5: M̀h' gōi bōng ngóh chīng-háh jēung tói.

column4: 一/兩杯 啤酒, 唔該.

column3: A glass of red/white wine, please.
column4: 一杯 紅/白 酒, 唔該.

column3: Do you have any bar snacks?

column4: 要多一 杯/樽, 唔該.

column3: Do you have this in my size?
column5: Nī gihn yáuh-móuh ngóh go má a?
Hó-m̀h-hó'yi béi go dói ngóh a?

column4: 你哋送唔送貨(去外國)嘎?

column3: I want to rent a car.

column5: Bīndouh hó'yi máaih bóu hím gah?
